title: No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description:
When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are found. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.

It is expected that the search should first try to get the Java element and, if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.

NOTES:
OB: No results are found when searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: The expected behavior is that the search will successfully find declarations when using the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Right-click on a package.
3. Select 'Search' from the context menu.
4. In the search dialog, search for a declaration.

Expected result: The search should find the declaration.

Notes:
